input.job_description:
PROFILE  
Driven Business Development  
Executive  with a career  history  
in multi -state distributed  
businesses and proven skill in  
hiring,  developing,  and 
retaining  high-performance  
teams.  A motivating  leader  
with strengths in building  
strategic relationships to  
support key business  
initiatives. Highly skilled in  
change management,  
management  transition,  and 
merger  integration.  Offering  
excellent interpersonal and  
communication skills and  
experience managing  matrixed  
organizations.  
 
CONTACT  
PHONE:  
+92 320 5643343  
 
EMAIL:  
Arslanaly10@yahoo.com  MALIK  
ARSLAN  ALI 
EDUCATION  
 
University  of Haripur  
Bachelors  in Business  Administration  (BBA  Hons)  
2010 -2014  
 
Sarhad  College  of Commerce  
D.com  
2008 -2010  
 
WORK  EXPERIENCE   
WOW Health Pvt Limited [Senior Business  
Development  Manager]  
April  2022  – Till Date  
• Defined and integrated  roles,  
responsibilities, and processes for business  
team  and data management  organization  
• Identified and pursued valuable business  
opportunities to generate new company  
revenue  and improve  bottom -line profit  
• Established and maintained highly  
effective relationships with clients and  
industry partners  to drive  growth  
• Researched product pricing, ratings, and  
performance, and created comparison  
spreadsheets  to evaluate  competitors 
Motive  – Formally  Keep truck -In [Business  Development  Officer ] – Remote  
 March  2022  – July 2022 
 
• Built and strengthened relationships with new and existing  accounts to  drive revenue 
growth.  
• Negotiated sales deals between customers and agents , resulting  in mutually beneficial 
agreements and cultivated  relationships.  
• Conducted integrated sales presentations to illustrate the value of  product or service and 
tailor c all-to-action.  
• Applied needs -based analysis to assess current satisfaction  and the importance of various 
product features to customers.  
• Gained an understanding of goals, objectives , and processes to  meet client business 
needs.  
• Presented product concepts and offer ings to meet client’s specifications and preferences.  
• Managed sales cycle to maintain a solid customer base.  
• Cold called, canvassed , and obtained referrals to develop  
• sales pipeline.  
AdamJee  Life Assurance  [ Senior  Branch  Manager]  
Sep 2021–April  2022  
 
• Boosted sales and customer loyalty through  incentive  programs  
• Created new revenue streams and recruited  talented staff  for branch offices  
• Assessed employee performance and developed  improv ement plans  
• Resolved various issues impacting sales  management  and business  operations  
• Gathered and reviewed customer feedback to  improve  operations  
 
Pak Qatar Family Takaful [ Assistant Branch  Manager]  
   Oct 2019 -Sep 2021  
• Trained and guided team members to maintain  high productivity and  performance  
metrics  
• Mitigated business risks by working closely with  staff members and assessing 
performance  
• Cultivated and strengthened lasting client  relationships using strong issue resol ution 
and dynamic communication skills  
• Recruited, hired, and trained initial personnel,  working to establish key internal 
functions and  outline the scope of positions for the new  organization  
 
 
 
 Excellence  Limo  [ Business  Development  Executive]  
Jan 2017 -May 2019  
• Defined and integrated roles, responsibilities,  and processes for business team and 
data management organization  
• Identified and pursued valuable business  opportunities to generate new company 
revenue  and improve  bottom  line profit  
• Developed and executed strategic initiatives to  implement key changes and 
improvements in  business  development and  sales  programs  
• Developed  new proposals,  contracts,  and procedures to draw in more clients and  
streamline  work  operations  
 
Sarhad R uler Support Program  [MIS Officer ] 
Jan 2014-May 2016 
 
• Transfer data from paper formats into computer  files or database systems using 
keyboards, data  recorders or optical scanners  
• Type  in data provided  directly  from  customers  
• Create  spreadsheets  with large  numbers  of figures  without  mistakes  
• Verify data by comparing it to source  documents  
• Update  existing  data 
• Retrieve data from the database or electronic  files as  requested  
• Perform  regular  backups  to ensure  data preservation  
• Sort and organize paperwork after entering data  to ensure it  is not lost  
 
  SKILLS  
 
• Excellent listening skills Critical and creative  thinking  
• Product and service sales Strong sales proposal  writer  Customer satisfaction  
• Goals  and performance  Sales  expertise  
• Business  development  and planning  
• Sales  pipeline  management  
• Relationship  building  and rapport  
• CRMCertification  
• Critical  thinking  for Better  Judgement  and Decision  Making  
• sales  management  
• Sales  Foundation  
• Sales  Time  Management  
• Business  Analysis  and Process  Management
input.additional_info: Innovate Connections Inc. prefers candidates from recognized universities such as the University of Management & Technology and Lahore School of Economics. We encourage a remote working environment but require physical presence for team-building and strategic sessions twice a quarter. Relocation assistance is available for exceptional candidates. Our comprehensive assessment includes a technical test followed by structured interviews to evaluate both technical and soft skills comprehensively.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business, or a related field
Experience with business intelligence tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau
Proficiency in at least one programming language
